claim: Noam Chomsky developed a theory of transformational grammar in 1954.
premise_source_doc_sentence: From 1951 to 1955 he was appointed to Harvard University 's Society of Fellows , where he developed the theory of transformational grammar for which he was awarded his doctorate in 1955 .

claim: Noam Chomsky developed a theory of transformational grammar in 1954.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Move α is a feature of the Revised Extended Standard Theory  (  REST  )  of transformational grammar developed by Noam Chomsky in the late 1970s .

claim: Noam Chomsky developed a theory of transformational grammar in 1954.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The concept was originated by Noam Chomsky , and much current research in transformational grammar has been inspired by Chomsky 's Minimalist Program .

claim: Noam Chomsky developed a theory of transformational grammar in 1954.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Avram Noam Chomsky  (  born 1928  )  , American linguist , philosopher , cognitive scientist , political activist , author , lecturer , professor emeritus at MIT , known for early work in transformational grammar and A.I.
